Plot: Set in the near future, an ex-jewel thief receives a gift from his son: a robot butler programmed to look after him. But soon the two companions try their luck as a heist team.
Title: Robot & Frank
Actors: Frank Langella, James Marsden, Liv Tyler, Peter Sarsgaard
tomatoConsensus: Led by a brilliant performance from star Frank Langella, Robot & Frank works as both a quirky indie drama and as a smart, thoughtful meditation on aging.
